original_text:
“How often is it that the lamp of the wicked is put out?
    That their calamity comes upon them?
    That God distributes pains in his anger?
korean_text: 악인의 등불이 꺼짐과 재앙이 그들에게 닥침과 하나님이 진노하사 그들을 곤고하게 하심이 몇 번인가

sentences.original_text: How often is it that the lamp of the wicked is put out?
sentences.korean_translation: 악인의 등불이 꺼지는 것이 얼마나 자주 있는가?

sentences.original_text: That their calamity comes upon them?
That God distributes pains in his anger?
